sentence.english: She doesn't straighten her curly hair anymore.
sentence.spanish: Ella ya no alisa su pelo rizado.

sentence.english: Are you trying to straighten your hair even more?
sentence.spanish: ¿Estás intentando alisar tu pelo aún más?

sentence.english: He dyed his hair blonde last summer.
sentence.spanish: Él se tiñó el pelo de rubio el verano pasado.

sentence.english: Isn't he growing a beard for the winter?
sentence.spanish: ¿No se está dejando barba para el invierno?

sentence.english: My grandfather always wore a moustache.
sentence.spanish: Mi abuelo siempre llevó bigote.

sentence.english: He is going bald quite quickly.
sentence.spanish: Se está quedando calvo bastante rápido.

sentence.english: Aren't your brothers very tall?
sentence.spanish: ¿No son tus hermanos muy altos?

sentence.english: She maintains a slim figure by exercising regularly.
sentence.spanish: Ella mantiene una figura delgada haciendo ejercicio regularmente.

sentence.english: Most people in my family are of average height.
sentence.spanish: La mayoría de las personas en mi familia son de estatura media.

sentence.english: He wasn't always this thin.
sentence.spanish: Él no siempre fue tan flaco.

sentence.english: Are you feeling uncomfortable being shorter than your sister?
sentence.spanish: ¿Te sientes incómodo siendo más bajo que tu hermana?

sentence.english: They aren't overweight despite loving desserts.
sentence.spanish: Ellos no tienen sobrepeso a pesar de amar los postres.

sentence.english: I love how her hair looks when it's wavy.
sentence.spanish: Me encanta cómo le queda el pelo cuando está ondulado.

sentence.english: She is dyeing her hair brunette this afternoon.
sentence.spanish: Ella se está tiñendo el pelo de castaño esta tarde.

sentence.english: Did he always have ginger hair?
sentence.spanish: ¿Siempre tuvo el pelo pelirrojo?

sentence.english: He isn't shaving, so he's getting stubble.
sentence.spanish: Él no se afeita, así que le está saliendo barba de varios días.

sentence.english: The rugby players were all quite stocky.
sentence.spanish: Los jugadores de rugby eran todos bastante fornidos.

sentence.english: Are you trying to become more muscular?
sentence.spanish: ¿Estás intentando volverte más musculoso?

sentence.english: She doesn't like her freckles showing in summer.
sentence.spanish: A ella no le gusta que se le vean las pecas en verano.

sentence.english: Were you born with those dimples?
sentence.spanish: ¿Naciste con esos hoyuelos?

sentence.english: He is getting tattooed right now.
sentence.spanish: Él se está tatuando en este momento.

sentence.english: Why are you looking so scruffy today?
sentence.spanish: ¿Por qué estás tan desaliñado hoy?
